org.streaminer.stream.classifier

Interface Classifier<D,T>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Learner<D,PredictionModel<D,T>>, Model, PredictionModel<D,T>, Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    LinearRegression<D>, Regressor<D>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractClassifier, AbstractMultiClassifier, AbstractRegressor, BoundedBayes, LossyBayes, MajorityClass, MultiBayes, MultiLossyBayes, MultiRandomClassifier, MultiTopkBayes, NaiveBayes, NaiveBayesWOP, Perceptron, RandomClassifier, RegressionTree, RTree, StickySamplingBayes, TopKBayes

    public interface Classifier<D,T>
extends PredictionModel<D,T>, Learner<D,PredictionModel<D,T>>

    A classifier is basically just a PredictionModel and the associated learning algorithm. This interface defines that union.

    Author:
    Christian Bockermann <chris@jwall.org>

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface org.streaminer.stream.model.PredictionModel

        predict

      • Methods inherited from interface org.streaminer.stream.learner.Learner

        getModel, init, learn
